name: Number Wars
description:
You will not believe doing math can be so fun.
Looking for some fun and thrill while doing math?
Number Wars brings you best of both the worlds, Education and fun.
Lead an army of brave soldiers but remember that the count really matters. Defeat the your enemy smartly by joining forces and making new alliances to win the battles. Take control of more and more territories by joining with neutral groups and clashing with clans and claim your dominance.
Do you want to sharpen your math skills? This is an awesome educational math game for kids, teens and grown-ups where you have to quickly answer as many equations as possible. We all know that the best way to develop our mathematical mind is by exercising it each day.
The aim of this game is to answer as many mathematical questions correctly within the time frame as possible! This is a real brain picker of a game; it gets you to concentrate and use your mathematical thinking cap, and in turn, enhance your logic and reasoning skills.
Whether you are looking for a way to make math learning fun for the kids or yourself,This game is the answer for you. Number wars is geared towards helping develop basic mathematic skills such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, division.With difficultly levels to pick from, ranging from basic, advanced and expert, offering something for every age group.
The more arithmetic practice you get playing this game, the easier you should find it. Attack those sums,and you never know who might achieve a high score in the family.
Lots of challenging levels with increasing difficulty.
